TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlSchemaContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义一个可重用上下文，用于解释或映射 XAML 类型以及为这些类型提供支持的程序集中的类型。

span.span: Defines a reusable context for interpreting or mapping XAML types, and the types in the assemblies that underlie them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 架构上下文提供了一个架构或词汇对于 XAML 与特定的分析器实现之间的抽象层。A XAML schema context provides a layer of abstraction between a schema or vocabulary for XAML, and a specific parser implementation. 方法是插入架构上下文的概念，可与不同的 XAML 分析器，架构和架构上下文填入与特定的 XAML 分析器进行交互所需的详细信息。By inserting the concept of a schema context, the schema can be used with different XAML parsers, and the schema context fills in the details that are needed to interact with a specific XAML parser. 例如，XAML 架构上下文提供了查询与 XAML 概念或 CLR 绑定到 XAML 类型系统相关的 Api。For example, the XAML schema context provides query APIs that relate to XAML concepts or to the CLR binding to the XAML type system. XAML 架构上下文也是负责维护的加载程序集，它定义其中 XAML 分析器查找后备类型的程序集列表。The XAML schema context is also responsible for maintaining the assembly list of loaded assemblies, which defines where a XAML parser looks for backing types.

para.span: 在、可以在多个同时包含这两者完整的调用方和部分信任的调用方之间共享。

span.span: In an , a can be shared between multiple callers, which include both full and partial trust callers.

para.span: 框架，例如 WPF 中，其中提供部分信任访问到使用 XAML 加载各个部分的 WPF 应用程序模型中存在这种情况。

span.span: This situation exists in frameworks such as WPF, which provide partial-trust access to XAML loading for portions of the WPF application model.

para.span: 默认值实现提供在此方案中的安全措施，通过将其所有属性和设置都保持为不可变。

span.span: The default implementation provides safeguards in this scenario by keeping all its properties and settings immutable.

para.span: 派生的实现中还应考虑以下属性的不可变性此模型和 XAML 架构上下文的设置。

span.span: Derived implementations should also consider following this model of immutability for properties and settings of a XAML schema context.

para.span: 基类进行设计，以便查找没有任何外部可观察到的副作用。

span.span: The base class is designed so that lookups have no externally observable side effects.

para.span: 通过引用的类型Api 中的类，如或，也会从查找任何副作用。

span.span: The types that are referenced by APIs in the base class, such as or , also produce no side effects from lookups.

para.span: 执行架构确定所需的所有数据应都可从的构造和设置。

span.span: All data that is needed to make a schema determination should be available from the construction and settings of the .

para.span: 请注意没有任何查找 Api 依赖于显式传入的服务; 示例：其输入依赖于仅输入的字符串。

span.span: Notice that no lookup APIs rely on explicitly passed-in services; their input relies on string input only.

para.span: 基类，和和都是线程安全地执行其基实现。

span.span: The base class, and and are all thread safe in their base implementations.

para.span: 如果派生自或派生 XAML 类型系统类，如和，你可以选择你的类将充当线程安全。

span.span: If you derive from or derive XAML type system classes such as and , you can choose whether your classes will behave as thread safe.

summary.span: 提供一个非标准 实现，该实现不调用 。

span.span: Provides a nonstandard implementation that does not invoke .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过自动垃圾回收或手动操作，则不应释放 XAML 架构上下文。XAML schema contexts should not be disposed by automatic garbage collection or by manual operations. 尽管 XAML 架构上下文不具有任何非托管的资源，但属性可能仍处于活动状态，并释放的 XAML 架构上下文可能会妨碍相关的延迟加载操作。Although XAML schema contexts have no unmanaged resources, properties might still be active, and disposing a XAML schema context can interfere with the related defer-load operation. 通过此实现清理作为弱引用内部挂钩的事件处理程序。 event handlers, which are hooked internally as weak references, are cleaned up by this implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回建立的设置中的值构造函数签名。This property returns the value that is established in the settings for the constructor signature. 如果其他签名已用于构造，或如果未特别设置`true`，此属性的值是`false`。If other signatures were used for construction or if is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`. 此属性的值会影响返回的字符串。The value of this property influences the strings that are returned by . 如果是`true`，字符串的程序集部分报告的等效项。If is `true`, the assembly portion of the string reports the equivalent of .

summary.span: 在操作使用此架构上下文来解析程序集时调用，必须提供该程序集才能解析它包含的 XAML 命名空间。

span.span: Called when operations use this schema context to resolve an assembly that is required in order to resolve the XAML namespaces that it contains.
The resolved assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础的程序集解析技术，这是一个内部 API，已对不同的字符串形式的程序集名称的内置容差，因为基于构造行为。The underlying assembly resolution technique, which is an internal API, has built-in tolerances for different string forms of an assembly name as based on the construction behavior. 此 API 的目的是能够首次解析针对已知的程序集，如针对而不是针对全局程序集缓存的引用程序集。The purpose of this API is to enable first-opportunity resolution against known sets of assemblies, such as against reference assemblies instead of against a global assembly cache. 如果填充的引用程序集的列表，则默认实现可以访问的已知的引用程序集。If the list of reference assemblies is populated, the default implementation can access the known reference assemblies.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 XAML 架构及其上下文是否支持存在 arity（输入参数的数量）相同的两个构造函数的标记扩展。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether a XAML schema and its context support markup extensions that have two constructors with the same arity (number of input parameters).

value.span: 如果架构上下文允许 arity 重复的标记扩展，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the schema context permits markup extensions that have duplicate arity; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回建立的设置中的值构造函数签名。This property returns the value that is established in the settings for the constructor signature. 如果其他签名用于构造，或如果未特别设置`true`，此属性的值是`false`。If other signatures are used for construction or if is not specifically set to `true`, the value of this property is `false`. XAML 规范 [MS-XAML] 第节 6.6.7.2 未专门得到解决重复 arity 的标记扩展。Duplicate arity of markup extensions is not specifically addressed by the XAML specification [MS-XAML], section 6.6.7.2. 这是因为形成的标记扩展的 XAML 信息项而不考虑在标记扩展实现中可能存在的重复 arity 等同。This is because formation of the XAML information item for a markup extension is identical regardless of duplicate arity that might exist in the markup extension implementation. 仅实际调用标记扩展并将其`ProvideValue`公开与重复 arity 相关联的任何问题。Only the actual invocation of the markup extension and its `ProvideValue` exposes any issues associated with duplicate arity. 处理重复 arity 的行为因此是不确定，并且仍最多每个实现的 XAML 架构上下文和其 XAML 编写器集成。Behavior for handling duplicate arity is thus undefined and is left up to each implementing XAML schema context and its XAML writer integration. 默认 XAML 架构上下文的.NET Framework XAML 服务操作实现不支持重复 arity;处理具有基础重复 arity 的标记扩展用法时，各种.NET Framework XAML 服务 Api 将引发异常。The default XAML schema context as implemented for .NET Framework XAML Services operations does not support duplicate arity; various .NET Framework XAML Services APIs will throw exceptions when processing markup extension usage with underlying duplicate arity. 有关定义标记扩展的详细信息，请参阅[的标记扩展 XAML 概述](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information about defining markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md).

span.span: if contains a usable result; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在内部，使用以下查找顺序：Internally, this method uses the following lookup order: 1. 已由早期查找填充一个内部实现的兼容性字典。An internally implemented compatibility dictionary, which may have been populated by an earlier lookup. 2. 参数评估。The parameter evaluation. 如果不发现任何其他兼容的命名空间，并且此方法返回`false`、`compatibleNamespace`参数输出可能具有相同的值作为`xamlNamespace`输入。If no other compatible namespace is discovered and this method returns `false`, the `compatibleNamespace` parameter output might have the same value as the `xamlNamespace` input.

span.span: is .
